00015 struct StaticBuffer {
00016         const char *data;
00017         std::string::size_type size;
00018 
00019         StaticBuffer(const std::string &str) {
00020                 data = str.data();
00021                 size = str.size();
00022         }
00023         
00024         StaticBuffer(const char *data) {
00025                 this->data = data;
00026                 this->size = strlen(data);
00027         }
00028         
00029         StaticBuffer(const char *data, unsigned int size) {
00030                 this->data = data;
00031                 this->size = size;
00032         }
00033 };

00035 template<typename T> boost::shared_ptr<T>
00036 ptr(T *pointer) {
00037         return boost::shared_ptr<T>(pointer);
00038 }
00039 
00040 template<typename T> std::string
00041 toString(T something) {
00042         std::stringstream s;
00043         s << something;
00044         return s.str();
00045 }

00048 #ifdef PASSENGER_DEBUG
00049         #define P_DEBUG(expr) \
00050                 do { \
00051                         if (Passenger::_debugStream != 0) { \
00052                                 *Passenger::_debugStream << \
00053                                         "[" << getpid() << ":" << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << "] " << \
00054                                         expr << std::endl; \
00055                         } \
00056                 } while (false)
00057         #define P_TRACE P_DEBUG
00058 #else
00059         #define P_DEBUG(expr) do { /* nothing */ } while (false)
00060         #define P_TRACE P_DEBUG
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 void initDebugging(const char *logFile = NULL);

00065 // Internal; do not use directly.
00066 extern std::ostream *_debugStream;
